entries.title: The Far Side comic 1 for April 25, 2024
The Far Side comic 2 for April 25, 2024

summary.caption: “C’mon! Look at these fangs! Look at these claws! You think we’re supposed to eat just honey and berries?”

entries.title: The Far Side comic 3 for April 25, 2024

summary.caption: “You recognize this, Mr. Grok? … We found it in the bushes near the victim’s cave. Isn’t this your atlatl, Mr. Grok?”

entries.title: The Far Side comic 4 for April 25, 2024

summary.caption: “Look out, Larry! … That retriever has finally found you!”

entries.title: The Far Side comic 5 for April 25, 2024

summary.caption: “Mr. Fenton? First of all, I want to say that it’s all Carl Denham’s fault. ‘Watchin’ that machine?’ I says to Carl, and … Wait, Carl! You can talk when I’m through!”
